Name: Paradise
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and apricot wedge.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Garnish with apricot wedge on rim.
Review: This gin-based cocktail elegantly highlights the quality of your apricot liqueur. Off-dry rather than sweet.
History: The Paradise Cocktail first appears in Harry McElhone's 1922 Harry's ABC of Mixing Cocktails as an equal parts dry gin, apricot brandy, and orange juice. It then reappears with a better formulation in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Paradise contains 159 calories
